name: CFWheels Template Example App
author: Tom King
shortDescription: A CFWheels 2.x example app with user management, role based permissions and password resets

scripts.postInstallAll:
rm base/box.json --force &&
			cp config/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp controllers/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp events/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp global/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp javascript/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp migrator/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp models/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp plugins/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp stylesheets/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp tests/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp views/ base/ --recurse &&
			cp base/ ./ --recurse &&
			rm base/ --recurse --force
